alert.note: Alert for Burnett (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 05 at 3:13PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...NEAR CRITICAL FIRE WEATHER CONDITIONS FOR SUNDAY AFTERNOON FOR PORTIONS OF NORTHWEST WISCONSIN... Dry conditions and breezy winds will lead to near critical fire weather conditions Sunday afternoon. Southwest to west winds of 15 to 25 mph with gusts to 35 mph are forecast for Sunday afternoon. Minimum relative humidity values of 25 to 30 percent are also expected. Together, these conditions could lead to the rapid spread of fires. Check burning restrictions and fire danger before burning. For more information on burning restrictions for Wisconsin, see www.dnr.wi.gov/topic/ForestFire/restrictions.asp.
